title: A Pickpocket’s Tale
excerpt: The spectacular thefts of Apollo Robbins.

title: Story #1 - Embezzlers are Nice People | Stimmel Law
excerpt: We spend a lot of time suing embezzlers. All over the world. Week in and week out. Big embezzlers, small embezzlers, smart embezzlers and very smart embezzlers… That’s right, no dumb embezzlers because almost all the embezzlers we encounter are smart. Some are very smart. Some are brilliant. And, almost always, most would have made more money and had a more profitable career if they had simply stopped stealing and starting working honestly.
